scripts.dev: cross-env mode=DEVELOPMENT tsc-watch --onSuccess "node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config  src/app.js"
scripts.prod: cross-env mode=PRODUCTION tsc-watch --onSuccess "node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config  src/app.js"
scripts.debug: cross-env mode=DEVELOPMENT tsc-watch --onSuccess "node inspect -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config src/app.js"
